overview:
M.Sc.(Econ), has more than 25 years of experience in the development and managing of international business. Prior to establishing CIM, Heikki was senior vice president and a member of the Management Committee for the Finnish Fund for Industrial Cooperation Ltd â€“ FINNFUND. During his tenure FINNFUND made more than 100 investments around the world. Heikki has also lived and worked in Vienna, Zurich and Paris.

From 1979 until 1999 Heikki was a member of the management team of Savonlinna Opera Festival. He is also a co-founder of the Forbidden City Music Festival (Beijing).

Language skills: German, English, French, Swedish.

At CIM in addition to management duties, Heikki is involved in evaluation and business development of investee companies.
